title: Launch button
body: So my friend has a pproblrm with his launcher, after he opens it he clicks launch, but it only goes grey only to revert back and have to press launch again. This problem only happened after ge gets the maestro error.  He has already tried to reinstall League but the same thing happens. We have tried to google some solutions but none of them seem to work. Please help, Thanks

replies.body: Your friend may be having an issue with his operating system's security setting, which might blocking the client from launching.  Have him go over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to troubleshoot.  If it persists, ask him to submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help him individually.  I hope that helps!
Thank you so much, but it still says that the Maestro error is still there, not sure what to do{{item:3151}}
